amendment.description: To provide humanitarian food assistance in connection with U.S. activities in Iraq.

vote.text: Amendment SA 455 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 67 - 26. Record Vote Number: 124.

action.text: Amendment SA 455 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Kohl. (consideration: CR S4803-4806; text: CR S4803) To provide humanitarian food assistance in connection with U.S. activities in Iraq.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 455 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 67 - 26. Record Vote Number: 124.
